title: Picturing Your Goal Weight Self
itunes:title: Picturing Your Goal Weight Self
description:
Get the Free Course here:
https://phit.click/freecourse

 

When we to lose weight it's so hard to picture our "thin" self if we have NEVER been thin OR it's so "far away."

In this episode I give you two KEY questions you must be asking yourself if you want to create a healthy version of yourself. And, I teach you how to picture yourself losing weight in BABY STEPS!
